tasks.task: Conducting a plot tour of overwintering agricultural covers.
subtasks: Describing the planting date and objectives for the cereals and legumes.
Evaluating clover varieties' overwinter survival and growth.
Comparing different winter pea (LEN) varieties' performance under cold conditions.
Assessing the overwintering success of various lentil types.
Highlighting the contrasting performance of different vetch varieties (e.g., AU Merit, Montana).
Examining rye (ELB) cultivars' growth and weed suppression.
Evaluating triticale (e.g., Forage FX-1001, Thor) and wheat varieties' winter hardiness and growth.
Observing the impact of winter cover crops on weed suppression compared to monocultural stands.
Documenting the integration of multiple cover crop species (e.g., vacuum cleaner mix) for diverse grazing and soil health benefits.
